name: Naut in Danger
description:
Your spaceship has been invaded by unknown creature and you have to run for your life.

Try to stay alive for as long as possible by avoiding obstacles, collecting oxygen and grabbing the speed boost.

Game includes Google play achievements and Google play leaderboards.

This is the first game I made in Unreal Engine 4. Suggestions for improvements to the game are appreciated.

There are no ads in game. Just wanted to make something for fun.

Controls:
  • Joystick - Moving
  • Touch anywhere to open door when Green
